The ultimate troll game.  I spent more time trying to hop on a box than I did beating the baddies.  It's still fun talking to the same 4 scientist faces scattered through-out the facility, and the support never does seem to follow you as you patiently line up your 78th crouch-jump manoeuvre to get through a gap for progression.  The neck-tie physics is well ahead of it's time, accurate physics and an independent tie model mean you stay 'in the zone' while that familiar scientist crumples to the ground and the tie flails exactly as you expect it to.
Highly recommended.

This game was awesome. I really enjoyed everything about it. The enemies were very challenging, the maps are good, but I hate the map Interlope it proved to be one of the most difficult maps ever but still I was able to beat it. I had fun blasting enemies and the story was good. I'd definitely recommend everyone to play this game.
I don't know what to say but its pretty damn good.
Just buy it like you could run it on a potato.

This is my first FPS, and so I'm very bad at it. But it's a super charming and interesting game with a great world and some neat characters (like the G-Man). The alien enemies are really fun, but I can't stand the military enemies, they just flank and throw so many grenades I can't keep up. But I want to keep playing, the puzzles (while occasionally a little janky) are really fun to solve, and when the combat is good, it's really good. 
I'm also playing on easy, so I know that I really suck, but the game's great, I'm just bad at it.
It good me like, you play now.
This is only the half life. If you want the full life you gotta buy the DLC.
